properties.displayName: File And SubFolder Enumeration Via Dir Command
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine =~ "*dir*-s*" or ProcessCommandLine =~ "*dir*/s*") and (FolderPath endswith "\\cmd.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "Cmd.Exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of the "dir" command part of Widows CMD with the "/S" command line flag in order to enumerate files in a specified directory and all subdirectorie
